All things Jekyll at JekyllConf

Apr 22, 2015

Check out jekyllconf.com for information on the upcoming JekyllConf web-conference on 10am - 5pm (PST), Saturday 2nd May 2015

And, thanks to @DavidDarnes for these links to the #jekyllconf videos

For those of you who missed it, the whole recording can be found here. Also, here’s the direct links to each speaker within the video:

Brian Rinaldi - Comparing Jekyll with the Competition1

Kyle Rush - Meet the Obama Campaign’s $250 Million Fundraising Platform

Ben Balter - GitHub Pages behind the scenes

Tom Preston-Werner - Some crazy ideas I have for the future of static sites

Brandon Mathis - [What the heck is Octopress and why should I care?(https://youtu.be/X5sJIL-nOhg?t=3h14m42s)

Michael Jovel - Building Living Style Guides with Jekyll

Mike Neumegen - A CMS for Jekyll

Parker Moore - Jekyll 3 and Beyond
